page.title: 10LEISURE/TRANSPORT
page.content: ANNUAL ATTENDANCE OF 390,000.RACING NIGHTS ARE TUESDAYS AND SATURDAYS. OTHER LEISURE FACILITIES INCLUDE THE RELATIVELY MODERN{WALTHAMSTOW SWIMMING {POOL.}THIS FACILITY IS OPEN TO THE PUBLIC BUT IS USED BY THE{LONDON {BOROUGH OF WALTHAM FOREST}(IN CONJUNCTION WITH OTHER BATHS IN THE BOROUGH) TO RUN A PROGRAMME OF {SWIMMING INSTRUCTION}WITH QUALIFIED INSTRUCTORS WITH THE{AIM}TO HAVE{EVERY {SCHOOL CHILD A COMPETENT SWIMMER BEFORE THEY REACH{SECONDARY EDUCATION. {RELATES TO SQUARES 7&8&12} THIS PART OF THE QUADRANT IS DOMINATED BY THE BEGINNING(END) OF THE{M11 {MOTORWAY}WHERE IT LINKS WITH THE{NORTH {CIRCULAR ROAD(A406).}THE APPROACH ROADS HAVE BEEN CUT TO THE EAST OF WATERWORKS CORNER PASSING UNDER WASHINGTON ROAD. AT ITS WIDEST THERE ARE 10 LANES OF CARRIAGEWAY.4 OF THESE
